TopicTitle: geeking out on exotic propulsion (mach effect, em, etc)

lots of presentations about theory and experiments regarding em drive, mach effect drive and other exotic propulsion concepts from the people that do them. there are a lot of videos, some more interesting that others, all very long, ive been watching them all week.

*e

do watch woodward's video on page 3. the terms 'quadradic scaling' and 'heavy lift' were used.
